caption.title: Observed and predicted hepatitis E cases.
caption.p: Observed weekly cases (circles) and expected weekly cases at the three sites based on the baseline transmission model (solid line) and 95% Credible Intervals for the mean (shaded coloured region) and for the predicted number of cases (shaded grey region). Week number 1 corresponds to the first week of 2007. Times when the first, second and third vaccine doses would have been given under reactive vaccination strategies triggered by 50 or 100 cumulative cases are shown by open and closed triangles respectively.
